dct_description_sm: Imprint derived from the atlas in which the map was issued.; Neele sculpt.; Numbered No. 42.; Shows boundaries, rivers and principal settlements; colouring shows possession.; Relief shown by hachures and shading.; Greenwich meridian.
dct_publisher_sm: Drawn & engraved for Thomson's New general Atlas (Edinburgh)
